name: The Drill
description: You operate the drilling activities on the planet Aluridia II. You goal is to reach the Ullysoprase core, a key mineral in modern energy. Try to survive as your drill malfunctions and your supply dwindles, all the while dealing with the creeping loneliness of being the sole operator of your craft. Will you complete the 52 day trek to the core? Or will you perish before you can find the truth behind your operation?
